text: Marylebone Cricket Club was founded in 1787 by Thomas Lord. It was one of the most important cricket clubs in the world for much of the history of cricket. ==See== *MCC website Category:Buildings and structures in the City of Westminster Category:Sports buildings in the United Kingdom Category:1780s establishments in England Category:Sports organisations of England Category:First-class cricket teams in England and Wales
title: Marylebone Cricket Club
